## ValidationIssueFilters.byIncludedSeverities() method

> This API is provided as a preview for developers and may change based on feedback that we receive. Do not use this API in a production environment.
> 

Creates a `ValidationIssueFilter` that includes all `ValidationIssue` instances where the `ValidationIssue#severity` is one of the given severities.

**Signature:**

```typescript
static byIncludedSeverities(...includedServerities: ValidationIssueSeverity[]): ValidationIssueFilter;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  includedServerities | [ValidationIssueSeverity](./3d-tiles-validator.validationissueseverity.md)<!-- -->\[\] | The included severities |

**Returns:**

[ValidationIssueFilter](./3d-tiles-validator.validationissuefilter.md)

The `ValidationIssueFilter`
